DESCRIPTION: Manage and configure Hope's Birthdays addon.
EXAMPLE:
{{prefix}}bdays enable **- to activate the addon**
{{prefix}}bdays disable **- to disable the addon**
{{prefix}}bdays channel** - to set the announcement channel**
NIVER:
您需要提及一个有效频道的 ID！
例如：**`{{prefix}}`setniver 通道 843583652729323560**
